Posts.Content: I'm also having this procedure done on Wednesday.. I'm completely freaked out. I don't understand why there is no sedation for something like this..I've been reading such horror stories. Thanks for sharing some positive experiences.. I have a strong family history..mom and aunt..I know I have no choice but to do it..just feeling completely scared
Posts.Title: Terrified... Stereotactic Breast Biopsy

Posts.Content: Thank you so much Sandra for responding.. I feel so much better!!!!!
Posts.Title: Terrified... Stereotactic Breast Biopsy
